root.name: Yolanda
root.description: OverviewYolanda is a puzzle platformer developed by Millennium Interactive for the Amiga. It stars the princess Yolanda, who has been cursed by the goddess Hera out of jealousy of her beuty. She must now reenact the twelve labors of Hercules, or else any man she falls in love with will die horribly. The game is noted for its considerable difficulty, requiring precise timing and much trial and error to navigate the numerous invisible or disappearing platforms.
